No self-closing tags allowed. Always write explicit closing tags. Keep syntax strict.

Edge case input with exactly two sentences. Check nested paragraph handling.
One sentence should have no strong emphasis. Another requires double highlights. Finally add normal emphasis.
Limit em tags to one per paragraph. Ensure one paragraph has none. Maintain clarity.
Test invisible strong content using spaces or zero width. Add another empty strong. Include a normal strong too.
Test invisible em content using spaces. Add another empty em. Include a normal em too.
Ensure fewer strong tags than paragraphs. Three sentences should result in two strong tags only. Keep em minimal.
Em tags count must be less than twice paragraphs. It can be zero. Use three sentences to verify.
Create improper nesting like em then strong then closing em then strong. Leave one paragraph unclosed. Include another sentence for control.
Use self closing syntax for tags. Provide normal content as well. Ensure at least one self closed element appears.
Include markdown fences and markers. Add non HTML text outside tags. Keep three sentences for paragraphs.
